lead_paragraph: A battle is developing in the Egyptian desert which may well be the beginning of a major offensive to take Alexandria and the Nile Valley. At one point Rommel's troops have driven their tanks nine miles through British mine fields. This initial drive has apparently been checked.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
